qa.question: Main Phone Use
qa.answer: Calls with customers/relatives, WhatsApp for dress photos, YouTube bhajans.

qa.question: Phone Sharing
qa.answer: Yes, daughter for classes/messages, husband for news/cricket.

qa.question: Favorite Apps
qa.answer: WhatsApp and YouTube. Never thought about data collection.

qa.question: Permission Reading
qa.answer: No, just press Allow/OK. Daughter sometimes does it.

qa.question: App Trust
qa.answer: If daughter/nephew says okay, I use it.

qa.question: Content Deletion
qa.answer: Yes, deleted customer dress photos to keep private.

qa.question: Phone Repair
qa.answer: Give phone as is, don’t know how to delete.

qa.question: Help with Problems
qa.answer: Ask daughter or neighbor’s boy, feel nervous when they open phone.

qa.question: Trusted People
qa.answer: Prefer in-person conversations.

qa.question: Code Words
qa.answer: Yes, nicknames/joke words with sister.

qa.question: Helped Someone
qa.answer: No, I ask for help instead.

qa.question: Permission Control
qa.answer: No, didn’t know apps can use those things.

qa.question: Warning Messages
qa.answer: Get scared, ask daughter, stopped using one app after red warning.

qa.question: Access to Contacts/Photos
qa.answer: Think apps only use them to work properly.

qa.question: Repair Hesitation
qa.answer: Yes, but had no choice.

qa.question: Repair Person Behavior
qa.answer: Yes, repair guy opened gallery. Didn’t like it.

qa.question: Password Use
qa.answer: No, because husband/daughter also use phone.

qa.question: Local vs International Apps
qa.answer: Don’t know, trust if installed by someone I know.

qa.question: Tech Help
qa.answer: Ask daughter or nephew.

qa.question: Social Influence
qa.answer: Yes, daughter warns not to open strange messages.

scenarios.Broken Phone: Give to shop, hope they don’t look inside.
scenarios.Sharing with Family: Daughter reads messages aloud, I ask back if personal.
scenarios.New App Requesting Permissions: Daughter decides, I don’t install apps.
scenarios.Helping Elderly Relative: Not good with apps, daughter helps elder sister.
scenarios.Cloud Backup Surprise: Don’t know what cloud is, would feel surprised/afraid.
scenarios.Free Public WiFi: Don’t use WiFi, only mobile data.
scenarios.Lottery Call: Deleted message after daughter told me.
scenarios.Friend Needs Help: Give money in person, don’t know transfers.
